summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 CHRYSLER 200. WHEN THE CONTACT SHIFTED THE GEAR INTO THE PARK POSITION, THE INSTRUMENT PANEL GAUGES FLUCTUATED INDEPENDENTLY AND THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS ABLE TO RESTART ON THE FIRST ATTEMPT; HOWEVER, THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN INDEPENDENT TOW COMPANY (718-828-1500) WHO INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE ALTERNATOR FAILED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED DUE TO THE QUOTE PROVIDED. THE MANUFACTURER AND DEALER WERE NOT CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 101,580.
